name: Bubblegum Bandit
description:
A Fantastic, Galactic Tale

In a galaxy overtaken by evil robots, one renegade known as the Bubblegum Bandit seeks to tear apart their oppressive regime ship by ship. With the power of gravity manipulation and bubblegum, the bandit flips and sticks their way through enemy ships to blow them up from the inside!

Bubblegum Bandit invites players to a bright, colorful, and exciting take on outer space with danger around every corner. Embody a cheeky space rogue who saves the galaxy by wreaking havoc!

Main Heist: Steal Energy Orb

A robot's strong metallic armor makes them impossible to damage directly, allowing them to take over the galaxy unopposed. However, the Bubblegum Bandit discovered that if they are able destroy a robot spaceship, they can deal with all of the robots in the ship at the same time!


As the Bubblegum Bandit, dodge and weave your way hordes of robots to find and steal the energy orb, each ship’s sole power source. Steal the orb to cause the ship to EXPLODE! Escape back to the start to not get caught in the blast!

Secondary Mission: Rescue Captives

During your invasion you may come across innocent people captured on the ship! Rescue captives by walking or flipping into them. Though it is not necessary to save them, you may unlock something special if you save them all...
